item.title: CVE-2023-1075|2023-03-27T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- linus%20kernel
item.description: A flaw was found in the Linux Kernel. The tls_is_tx_ready() incorrectly checks for list emptiness, potentially accessing a type confused entry to the list_head, leaking the last byte of the confused field that overlaps with rec->tx_ready.
